main.java.questfortheabodeth.sprites

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.questfortheabodeth.sprites.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bullet, ClickableImage, Environment

    public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable
    Creates a wrapper for a Sprite that has the texture of an image If the image has not already been loaded it is added to a static array in the settings file to save on memory when loading again
